reapack.desc: Suzuki ReaDrum Machine

version.name: 1.0.1a
version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed a pad number Removed track templates from fx browser

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed crash when no track is selected Disabled mousewheel

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed a vertical menu button offset when window is docked

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Hotfix:Load RS5k with user-defined preset and handle loading samples when user-defined preset is set

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed naming issue introduced in v1.0.3

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed updating pads depending on the track selected

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Added a menu to explode pads to tracks

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed cropping drag/drop, play, and mute display

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Changed midi note filter name. Let me know on the forum if someone already saves a preset, template, etc using this script.

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed path for mac, thanks fro testing it BryanChi!

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Provides a scrollable layout version script

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Added function to enhance a feature of FX Devices

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Added highlight to selected vertical bar which opens pads window

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: You can navigate the vertical tab while drag/dropping FX and move/copying a pad sample/FX now.

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed the problem note filter is suffixed.

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Made note filter's CC passthrough default

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Added menu to set pad's channel output pin mappings. Give it a try to use it in conjunction with my set channel input pin mappings script. + Added menu to explode a single pad to a new track via user input. Only channel 1/2 signal stays in the main track and goes to master. I'll fix "Explode all pads" in the next update.

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Now RDM remembers which tab was open (or not) when it's closed. + You can sweep (left dragging) vertcal tabs to open it.

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Scrollable layout version now remembers the scroll location where users closed the script last time. # Unfloat FX windows even if users check "auto-float new FX windows" because users can float windows easily by clicking pads if they want.

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Added support for ReaDrum Machine inside container. Beware that only one RDM instance per track is allowed, just like it's been up to now.

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Added support for reversed state, playrate (stretch), pan, pitch of samples from arrange. # Fixed the default send/receive volume bug.

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Added RDM Tools section to FX List # Changed "Explode Pad to Track" menu name to avoid confusion

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Added toggle multi select (Shift + Click pad). Mute, solo, add FX, remove pad, rename, output pin mappings, explode, obey note-off, and loop are supported. Shift + double clicking the outside of pads toggle selects all pads in the tab. Alt + double clicking the outside of pads toggle selects all pads. Support for move, swap, and copy pads, adding samples, and load selected items to selected pads will be added in the future update. + MIDI input triggers the drum pads to light up now.

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Automatically select second fx when opening FX window if midi utility is focused.

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Added MIDI triggered low-pass filter to RDM Tools # Tried to fix the crash user reported

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: # Fixed explode multiple selected pads to track # Fixed crash when users choose cancel or close the window when setting pad's output pin mappings or exploding it to tracks

version.name: 1.3.2-pre1
version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: * experimental: Right click a pad to open RS5k parameters UI window. It's only available for the fixed layout.

version.name: 1.3.2-pre2
version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: * experimental: Added arrow button to cycle through RS5k instances UI in pad. You can click RS5k instance name to float RS5k window.

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: # Added Suzuki_Replace old RDM midi note filter with new RDM midi utility script to make the old projects and container presets users saved be compatible with RDM newer versions.

source.file: Scripts/Suzuki_Replace old RDM midi note filter with new RDM midi utility.lua

version.changelog: # Handling the case where TrackFX_AddByName automatically adds the path to MIDI Utility name.

version.changelog: # Handling the case where TrackFX_AddByName automatically adds the path to MIDI Utility name.

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Added parameter knobs to RS5k UI section (only for fixed layout). Right click a pad to open UI. Shift drag for fine-tuning. I might change layout later, but use it as it is for now.

source.file: Scripts/Suzuki_Replace old RDM midi note filter with new RDM midi utility.lua

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Added parameter knobs to RS5k UI section (only for fixed layout). Right click a pad to open UI. Shift drag for fine-tuning. I might change layout later, but use it as it is for now. (Forgot to add images and fonts)

source.file: Scripts/Suzuki_Replace old RDM midi note filter with new RDM midi utility.lua

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Added the RS5k UI support for the srollable layout.

source.file: Scripts/Suzuki_Replace old RDM midi note filter with new RDM midi utility.lua

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Added support for moving knobs with mousewheel. + Hovering over parameter knobs show values. + RDM remembers your default values now. Ctrl + right clicking parameters asks you if you want to save your current value as default, and then you can double-click knobs to reset values to default. # Pitch increase/decrease by one semitone.

source.file: Scripts/Suzuki_Replace old RDM midi note filter with new RDM midi utility.lua
Scripts/Suzuki_Replace old RDM midi note filter with new RDM midi utility.lua

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Added CC passthrough to MIDI utility. Thanks SNJUK2! # Fixed crash when creating a new track while opening RS5k UI

source.file: Scripts/Suzuki_Replace old RDM midi note filter with new RDM midi utility.lua

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: # Made "Explode all pads to tracks" action be compatible with "Explode pad to track" action.

source.file: Scripts/Suzuki_Replace old RDM midi note filter with new RDM midi utility.lua

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Added volume adjustment to each pad. Shift + dragging pad adjusts pad's (container) volume.

source.file: Scripts/Suzuki_Replace old RDM midi note filter with new RDM midi utility.lua

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: + Added sample change feature. Open RS5k UI, hover mouse over sample name, and then press up arrow (previous sample), down arrow (next sample) or R key (random sample). # Migrate tilr's repo to new one. # Prevent loading non-audio files (e.g. .txt, .mid).

source.file: Scripts/Suzuki_Replace old RDM midi note filter with new RDM midi utility.lua
Scripts/Suzuki_Replace old RDM midi note filter with new RDM midi utility.lua

version.author: Suzuki
